alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 2:00PM MST until January 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ FRIDAY TO 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In Colorado, Cheyenne County. In Kansas, Wallace, Logan, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Friday to 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
